data.route_analysis: Guatemala offers multiple transportation options including buses and shuttles which connect major cities and attractions. Domestic flights are also available for quicker transit. Popular routes include Antigua to Lake Atitl√°n and Tikal to Flores.
data.seasonal_patterns: Peak travel months are December to April (dry season) while May to October experiences more rain, impacting travel plans.
data.climate: Guatemala has a tropical climate with a wet and dry season. Temperatures vary greatly by altitude; cooler in the highlands and warmer in coastal areas. Recommended to visit during the dry season for better weather, especially for outdoor activities.
data.culture: Guatemala is rich in Mayan heritage with vibrant local traditions. Important events include Semana Santa (Holy Week) and the Day of the Dead celebrations, showcasing colorful parades and rituals.
